name: Ride of the Valkyries
description:
Lancing is over - Sword racing is the new hot thing!

In this two player racing game you and your friend get to race each other to the death (or just honor) and duke it out in fights mid-race! Just remember to have fun :)

Controls for player 1 are WASD along with SHIFT to slash with the sword;

Controls for player 2 are the ARROW KEYS along with SPACE to slash with the sword
